name: Odor Sleuth
description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

name: Ominous Wind
description: May raise all user's stats at once.

name: Origin Pulse
description: Hits all adjacent opponents.

name: Outrage
description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

name: Overheat
description: Sharply lowers user's Special Attack.

name: Pain Split
description: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

name: Parabolic Charge
description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Parting Shot
description: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack then switches out.

name: Pay Day
description: A small amount of money is gained after the battle resolves.

name: Payback
description: Power doubles if the user was attacked first.

name: Perish Song
description: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: Hits all adjacent Pokémon.

name: Petal Dance
description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

name: Phantom Force
description: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

name: Photon Geyser
description: Uses Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher.

name: Pika Papow
description: Power increases when player's bond is stronger.

name: Pin Missile
description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Plasma Fists
description: Changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

name: Play Nice
description: Lowers opponent's Attack. Always hits.

name: Play Rough
description: May lower opponent's Attack.

name: Pluck
description: If the opponent is holding a berry, its effect is stolen by user.

name: Poison Fang
description: May badly poison opponent.

name: Poison Gas
description: Poisons opponent.

name: Poison Jab
description: May poison the opponent.

name: Poison Powder
description: Poisons opponent.

name: Poison Sting
description: May poison the opponent.

name: Poison Tail
description: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

name: Pollen Puff
description: Deals damage to opponent or restores HP of teammate.

name: Powder
description: Damages Pokémon using Fire type moves.

name: Powder Snow
description: May freeze opponent.

name: Power Split
description: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

name: Power Swap
description: User and opponent swap Attack and Special Attack.

name: Power Trick
description: User's own Attack and Defense switch.

name: Power Trip
description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

name: Power-Up Punch
description: Raises Attack.

name: Precipice Blades
description: Hits all adjacent opponents.

name: Present
description: Either deals damage or heals.

name: Prismatic Laser
description: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Protect
description: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

name: Psybeam
description: May confuse opponent.

name: Psych Up
description: Copies the opponent's stat changes.

name: Psychic
description: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

name: Psychic Fangs
description: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Psychic Terrain
description: Prevents priority moves from being used for 5 turns.

name: Psycho Boost
description: Sharply lowers user's Special Attack.

name: Psycho Cut
description: High critical hit ratio.

name: Psycho Shift
description: Gives the opponent the user's status condition, if it hits.

name: Psyshock
description: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

name: Psystrike
description: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

name: Psywave
description: Inflicts damage 50-150% of user's level.

name: Punishment
description: Power increases when opponent's stats have been raised.

name: Purify
description: The user heals the target's status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user's own HP.

name: Pursuit
description: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

name: Pyro Ball
description: May burn opponent.

name: Quash
description: Makes the target act last this turn.

name: Quick Attack
description: User attacks first.

name: Quick Guard
description: Protects the user's team from high-priority moves.

name: Quiver Dance
description: Raises user's Special Attack, Special Defense and Speed.

name: Rage
description: Raises user's Attack when hit.

name: Rage Powder
description: Forces attacks to hit user, not team-mates.

name: Rain Dance
description: Makes it rain for 5 turns.

name: Rapid Spin
description: Removes effects of trap moves.

name: Razor Leaf
description: High critical hit ratio.

name: Razor Shell
description: May lower opponent's Defense.

name: Razor Wind
description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

name: Recover
description: User recovers half its max HP.

name: Recycle
description: User's used hold item is restored.

name: Reflect
description: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

name: Reflect Type
description: User becomes the target's type.

name: Refresh
description: Cures paralysis, poison, and burns.

name: Relic Song
description: May put the target to sleep.

name: Rest
description: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

name: Retaliate
description: Inflicts double damage if a teammate fainted on the last turn.

name: Return
description: Power increases with higher Friendship.

name: Revelation Dance
description: Type changes based on Oricorio's form.

name: Revenge
description: Power increases if user was hit first.

name: Reversal
description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

name: Roar
description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

name: Roar of Time
description: User must recharge next turn.

name: Rock Blast
description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Rock Climb
description: May confuse opponent.

name: Rock Polish
description: Sharply raises user's Speed.

name: Rock Slide
description: May cause flinching.

name: Rock Smash
description: May lower opponent's Defense.

name: Rock Tomb
description: Lowers opponent's Speed.

name: Rock Wrecker
description: User must recharge next turn.

name: Role Play
description: User copies the opponent's Ability.

name: Rolling Kick
description: May cause flinching.

name: Rollout
description: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

name: Roost
description: User recovers half of its max HP and loses the Flying type temporarily.

name: Rototiller
description: Raises Attack and Special Attack of Grass-types.

name: Round
description: Power increases if teammates use it in the same turn.

name: Sacred Fire
description: May burn opponent.

name: Sacred Sword
description: Ignores opponent's stat changes.

name: Safeguard
description: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

name: Sand Attack
description: Lowers opponent's Accuracy.

name: Sand Tomb
description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Sandstorm
description: Creates a sandstorm for 5 turns.

name: Sappy Seed
description: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

name: Scald
description: May burn opponent.

name: Scary Face
description: Sharply lowers opponent's Speed.

name: Screech
description: Sharply lowers opponent's Defense.

name: Searing Shot
description: May burn opponent.

name: Secret Power
description: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

name: Secret Sword
description: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

name: Seed Flare
description: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

name: Seismic Toss
description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

name: Self-Destruct
description: User faints.

name: Shadow Ball
description: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

name: Shadow Bone
description: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Shadow Claw
description: High critical hit ratio.

name: Shadow Force
description: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

name: Shadow Punch
description: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

name: Shadow Sneak
description: User attacks first.

name: Sharpen
description: Raises user's Attack.

name: Sheer Cold
description: One-Hit-KO, if it hits.

name: Shell Smash
description: Sharply raises user's Attack, Special Attack and Speed but lowers Defense and Special Defense.

name: Shell Trap
description: Deals more damage to opponent if hit by a Physical move.

name: Shift Gear
description: Raises user's Attack and sharply raises Speed.

name: Shock Wave
description: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

name: Shore Up
description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

name: Signal Beam
description: May confuse opponent.

name: Silver Wind
description: May raise all stats of user at once.

name: Simple Beam
description: Changes target's ability to Simple.

name: Sing
description: Puts opponent to sleep.

name: Sizzly Slide
description: Burns the opponent.

name: Sketch
description: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

name: Skill Swap
description: The user swaps Abilities with the opponent.

name: Skull Bash
description: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

name: Sky Attack
description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching.

name: Sky Drop
description: Takes opponent into the air on first turn, drops them on second turn.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: Hits the opponent, even during Fly.

name: Slack Off
description: User recovers half its max HP.

name: Slash
description: High critical hit ratio.

name: Sleep Powder
description: Puts opponent to sleep.

name: Sleep Talk
description: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

name: Sludge
description: May poison opponent.

name: Sludge Bomb
description: May poison opponent.

name: Sludge Wave
description: May poison opponent.

name: Smack Down
description: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

name: Smart Strike
description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

name: Smelling Salts
description: Power doubles if opponent is paralyzed, but cures it.

name: Smog
description: May poison opponent.

name: Smokescreen
description: Lowers opponent's Accuracy.

name: Snap Trap
description: Snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

name: Snarl
description: Lowers opponent's Special Attack.

name: Snatch
description: Steals the effects of the opponent's next move.

name: Snipe Shot
description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

name: Snore
description: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

name: Soak
description: Changes the target's type to water.

name: Soft-Boiled
description: User recovers half its max HP.

name: Solar Beam
description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

name: Solar Blade
description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

name: Sonic Boom
description: Always inflicts 20 HP.

name: Spacial Rend
description: High critical hit ratio.

name: Spark
description: May paralyze opponent.

name: Sparkling Aria
description: Heals the burns of its target.

name: Sparkly Swirl
description: Cures all status problems in the party Pokémon.

name: Spectral Thief
description: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

name: Speed Swap
description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: Spider Web
description: Opponent cannot escape/switch.

name: Spike Cannon
description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Spikes
description: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

name: Spiky Shield
description: Protects the user and inflicts damage on contact.

name: Spirit Break
description: Lowers opponent's Special Attack.

name: Spirit Shackle
description: Prevents the opponent from switching out.

name: Spit Up
description: Power depends on how many times the user performed Stockpile.

name: Spite
description: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

name: Splash
description: Doesn't do ANYTHING.

name: Splishy Splash
description: May paralyze opponent.

name: Spore
description: Puts opponent to sleep.

name: Spotlight
description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

name: Stealth Rock
description: Damages opponent switching into battle.

name: Steam Eruption
description: May burn opponent.

name: Steamroller
description: May cause flinching.

name: Steel Beam
description: User loses 50% of its HP.

name: Steel Wing
description: May raise user's Defense.

name: Sticky Web
description: Lowers opponent's Speed when switching into battle.

name: Stockpile
description: Stores energy for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

name: Stomp
description: May cause flinching.

name: Stomping Tantrum
description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user's previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

name: Stone Edge
description: High critical hit ratio.

name: Stored Power
description: Power increases when user's stats have been raised.

name: Storm Throw
description: Always results in a critical hit.

name: Strange Steam
description: May confuse opponent.

name: Strength Sap
description: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: String Shot
description: Sharply lowers opponent's Speed.

name: Struggle Bug
description: Lowers opponent's Special Attack.

name: Stuff Cheeks
description: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.

name: Stun Spore
description: Paralyzes opponent.

name: Submission
description: User receives recoil damage.

name: Substitute
description: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

name: Sucker Punch
description: User attacks first, but only works if opponent is readying an attack.

name: Sunny Day
description: Makes it sunny for 5 turns.

name: Sunsteel Strike
description: Ignores the target's ability.

name: Super Fang
description: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

name: Superpower
description: Lowers user's Attack and Defense.

name: Supersonic
description: Confuses opponent.

name: Surf
description: Hits all adjacent Pokémon.

name: Swagger
description: Opponent becomes confused, but its Attack is sharply raised.

name: Swallow
description: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

name: Sweet Kiss
description: Confuses opponent.

name: Sweet Scent
description: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness.

name: Swift
description: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

name: Switcheroo
description: Swaps held items with the opponent.

name: Swords Dance
description: Sharply raises user's Attack.

name: Synchronoise
description: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

name: Synthesis
description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

name: Tail Glow
description: Drastically raises user's Special Attack.

name: Tail Slap
description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Tail Whip
description: Lowers opponent's Defense.

name: Tailwind
description: Doubles Speed for 4 turns.

name: Take Down
description: User receives recoil damage.

name: Tar Shot
description: Lowers the opponent's Speed and makes them weaker to Fire-type moves.

name: Taunt
description: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

name: Tearful Look
description: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Teatime
description: Forces all Pokémon on the field to eat their berries.

name: Techno Blast
description: Type depends on the Drive being held.

name: Teeter Dance
description: Confuses all Pokémon.

name: Telekinesis
description: Ignores opponent's Evasiveness for three turns, add Ground immunity.

name: Teleport
description: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

name: Thief
description: Also steals opponent's held item.

name: Thousand Arrows
description: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

name: Thousand Waves
description: Opponent cannot flee or switch.

name: Thrash
description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

name: Throat Chop
description: Prevents use of sound moves for two turns.

name: Thunder
description: May paralyze opponent.

name: Thunder Fang
description: May cause flinching and/or paralyze opponent.

name: Thunder Punch
description: May paralyze opponent.

name: Thunder Shock
description: May paralyze opponent.

name: Thunder Wave
description: Paralyzes opponent.

name: Thunderbolt
description: May paralyze opponent.

name: Tickle
description: Lowers opponent's Attack and Defense.

name: Topsy-Turvy
description: Reverses stat changes of opponent.

name: Torment
description: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

name: Toxic
description: Badly poisons opponent.

name: Toxic Spikes
description: Poisons opponents when they switch into battle.

name: Toxic Thread
description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Transform
description: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

name: Tri Attack
description: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

name: Trick
description: Swaps held items with the opponent.

name: Trick Room
description: Slower Pokémon move first in the turn for 5 turns.

name: Trick-or-Treat
description: Adds Ghost type to opponent.

name: Triple Kick
description: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

name: Trop Kick
description: Lowers opponent's Attack.

name: Trump Card
description: The lower the PP, the higher the power.

name: Twineedle
description: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

name: Twister
description: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

name: U-turn
description: User switches out immediately after attacking.

name: Uproar
description: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

name: V-create
description: Lowers user's Defense, Special Defense and Speed.

name: Vacuum Wave
description: User attacks first.

name: Veevee Volley
description: Power increases when player's bond is stronger.

name: Venom Drench
description: Lowers poisoned opponent's Special Attack and Speed.

name: Venoshock
description: Inflicts double damage if the target is poisoned.

name: Vital Throw
description: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

name: Volt Switch
description: User must switch out after attacking.

name: Volt Tackle
description: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

name: Wake-Up Slap
description: Power doubles if opponent is asleep, but wakes it up.

name: Water Pledge
description: Added effects appear if preceded by Fire Pledge or succeeded by Grass Pledge.

name: Water Pulse
description: May confuse opponent.

name: Water Shuriken
description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Water Sport
description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

name: Water Spout
description: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

name: Waterfall
description: May cause flinching.

name: Weather Ball
description: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

name: Whirlpool
description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Whirlwind
description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

name: Wide Guard
description: Protects the user's team from multi-target attacks.

name: Wild Charge
description: User receives recoil damage.

name: Will-O-Wisp
description: Burns opponent.

name: Wish
description: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

name: Withdraw
description: Raises user's Defense.

name: Wonder Room
description: Swaps every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense for 5 turns.

name: Wood Hammer
description: User receives recoil damage.

name: Work Up
description: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

name: Worry Seed
description: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.

name: Wrap
description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Wring Out
description: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.

name: Yawn
description: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.

name: Zap Cannon
description: Paralyzes opponent.

name: Zen Headbutt
description: May cause flinching.

name: Zing Zap
description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Zippy Zap
description: High critical-hit ratio.
